name: Santa's Great Idea
description:
Surprise! This year, Santa doesn't want to give the bad kids coal - he's had a change of heart. Instead, he's going around giving them presents instead! Whatever will this madman think of next?

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Left mouse button to fire presents, Right mouse button to fire coal.

Made using Unity engine.

Lots of thanks to https://itch.io/profile/lordspectra for being a great teammate and providing the music!
